attributes.action: Schools are open for only 4 days a week.
attributes.additional_details: Children need a catch up day where they can finish any uncompleted homework as it puts less stress on parents to get their kids to school on time and give teachers a chance to plan lessons for the next week. This allows them to mark more work so students and teachers can both enjoy their weekend without the stress of work or not being able to enjoy the rest of their week.
